meanings.sent1: She redefied the word 'success' to mean happiness.
meanings.sent2: The teacher redefied the math problem to make it easier for the students to understand.
meanings.sent3: He redefied the rules of the game by allowing players to use their feet instead of hands.
meanings.sent4: The artist redefied the traditional painting style by incorporating digital elements.
meanings.sent5: The scientist redefied the theory of gravity with a groundbreaking discovery.

meanings.definition: To give a new or different meaning to something.
meanings.sent1: The poet redefied love as a gentle breeze on a summer day.
meanings.sent2: The author redefied the ending of the story to surprise the readers.
meanings.sent3: The chef redefied the taste of chocolate by adding a hint of chili.
meanings.sent4: The musician redefied the sound of the guitar by experimenting with new techniques.
meanings.sent5: The designer redefied fashion by blending vintage and modern styles.
